mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_NM AS clientNm /* 고객사 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_TYPE AS markType /* 마크 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_UNIT AS markUnit /* 마크 단위, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_AMT AS markAmt /* 마크 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_CLIENT_INFO_PK(P),SYS_C0011278(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_NM = #{clientNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 명, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_TYPE = #{markType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 마크 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_UNIT = #{markUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 마크 단위, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_AMT = #{markAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 마크 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_NM AS clientNm /* 고객사 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_TYPE AS markType /* 마크 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_UNIT AS markUnit /* 마크 단위, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_AMT AS markAmt /* 마크 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_NM = #{clientNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 명, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_TYPE = #{markType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 마크 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_UNIT = #{markUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 마크 단위, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MARK_AMT = #{markAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 마크 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CLIENT_INFO SET /* 고객사 */ CLIENT_NM = #{clientNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,MARK_TYPE = #{markType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 마크 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MARK_UNIT = #{markUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 마크 단위, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MARK_AMT = #{markAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 마크 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
